MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power interruption in the CW6 postcode area of Tarporley affecting properties in Back Lane, Whitchurch Road and surrounding area. Following a previous fault supplies were restored via generator pending extensive repairs on the underground cable network. We have advised the generator company that their equipment has failed and they are expecting to be on site at 10:45am to rectify this as quickly and safely as possible. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:14am on 4th November 2020
